title: How to Make Toaster Strudel Vanilla Glaze

steps.headline: Combine all ingredients into a mixing bowl.
Whisk all ingredients together until the mixture is thick but pourable.
Add a few more drops of cream, if necessary, until desired consistency is reached.
Refrigerate until it reaches a medium hard consistency.

text: Combine all ingredients into a mixing bowl.  Whisk all ingredients together until the mixture is thick but pourable.  Add a few more drops of cream, if necessary, until desired consistency is reached.  Refrigerate until it reaches a medium hard consistency.  Finished.
